html:
7.22.22  6:13 am   What happen during 1804?

      the.... Louisiana purchase?

7.22.22  3:58 am   how long is your next video

      about 3:25

7.22.22  2:45 am   if I just do a thing like ten thousand times, I'll get better at it, right? .

      yes. or less times

7.22.22  1:03 am   how do you feel about filming outside for a video?

      that sounds lovely

7.22.22  12:24 am   how normal is this question

      all the way

7.22.22  12:19 am   why does popcorn pop?

      it's excited

7.21.22  11:35 pm   any advice for writing full songs if you're stuck writing only short loops?

      start by writing a short song that does not loop. this will start developing your relationship with "endings"

7.21.22  11:27 pm   what are your thoughts on thoughts and things

      they're pretty good

7.21.22  11:24 pm   are ground planes just trains?

      not quite

7.21.22  11:11 pm   Genuine question, but where do you get ideas for your songs?

     anywhere, everywhere,

     Do you just think of a certain word in your head and proceed to write a full song about that

     that can be done

      or do you just see something basic or perhaps interesting outside and make a song about that?

     that's also an option. I should mention: it's 2 different activities, starting songs and writing them. i can come up with starting ideas for songs all day and put them into the list, but it's an entirely different activity to take responsibility for finishing one. and i mostly only do that after i know it's been selected to also be the next one to be produced into a recording and video

7.21.22  10:22 pm   what can i do to make the gopher get out of my ukulele

      start playing songs a gopher would hate

7.21.22  10:07 pm   am i a bad person

      no, you are the best person

7.21.22  10:04 pm   opinions on airplane food? 

      "good enough"

7.21.22  9:54 pm   how to stop feeling like every waking moment of my life and everything i do is cringe

      it's time to start looking around and seeing how cringe everyone else can be sometimes

7.21.22  9:31 pm   how do I be more patient with myself in the creative process?

      finish everything immediately

7.21.22  9:23 pm   Are you a gamer?

      i am game

7.21.22  8:50 pm   are you a rock

      no

7.21.22  8:50 pm   hey bill, what's your favorite color?

      dark black

7.21.22  8:18 pm   Have you ever seen a stranger listening to your music?

      i've never seen a stranger

7.21.22  7:07 pm   are you a ground plane?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.21.22  6:28 pm   how much water is inside a watermelon

      it's more water than melon, that's for sure

7.21.22  5:44 pm   i feel like eating my cd player, how do i stop this feeling?

      go ahead and bake yourself a cake that looks like a cd player

7.21.22  4:21 pm   how much pasta is too much pasta

      how much can you handle

7.21.22  4:03 pm   Is the voluminous bus of "meet me in september" the same thing as the big big vehicle of "Long Long Long Journey"?

      i don't think so

7.21.22  3:48 pm   What kind of mindset should you be in to write music?

      'wrong'

7.21.22  3:38 pm   Is the song 'the world doesn't end' about moving on from a bad past.

     i could understand that

      If no, then what is the true meaning of this song. 

      exploring the possibility of the world not ending

7.21.22  3:24 pm   are the special sandals a metaphor for the ego?

      i could understand that

7.21.22  3:19 pm   What's your next song's name?

      i can't tell you

7.21.22  10:28 am   howto navigate

      go straight, take some turns, etc

7.21.22  10:14 am   opinions on garden hoses

      it's hard to believe a garden could fit through a hose

7.21.22  10:13 am   are you good at taking standardized tests, such as the SAT?

      i aced the math. i think the other half was about language, and i scored poorly because there were a whole bunch of words that i swear i've never seen in use before on planet earth. not my fault

7.21.22  10:13 am   Will you run up a hill in your next video?

      all options are on the table

7.21.22  6:36 am   are you a human?.

      oh man, that would explain all these ridiculous feelings

7.21.22  5:55 am   what if i hate this state of existence and i want to shut myself in 

      let me know when you come out

7.21.22  4:40 am   what is the longest time you have spent on a single song, from conceptualisation to release?

      there was one that was a 10.5 year time span from when i thought of the first part to when it was released, but i certainly was not working on it the entire time

7.21.22  4:15 am   Do you tend to start recording a song on keys to a click track and go from there, or do you start with drums and build up from that?

      first i put some temp things in so it's just enough to sing over, then i do all vocals, then remove all temp insts, then go ahead and start filling in the real instrument parts

7.21.22  1:36 am   what is your official stance on the issue of mosquitoes?

      never heard of them

7.21.22  1:10 am   How can I overcome my writer's block?

      write every possible combination of things

7.21.22  12:05 am   what do I do when I have too many ideas and cant focus on one thing

      go ahead and write down something that's none of them

7.20.22  11:45 pm   how do i stop feeling bad in the presence of things that are too good such as your music and website and everything

      that's on me. i will try to make it worse

7.20.22  11:21 pm   what's the maximum amount of things you can do in one (1) lifetime

      about 147

7.20.22  11:17 pm   Bill I'm really struggling at the moment, with everything. do u have any advice for someone who's struggling to find a place in the world?

      by the time you read this you may have already found it, BUT, you can start by drawing a map of your neighborhood

7.20.22  10:01 pm   A lot of what I'm doing seems promising, but feels like a throwaway. What should I do?

      continüe

7.20.22  9:54 pm   whats the best part of a culture war

      the memes

7.20.22  7:28 pm   what is your opinion on capital letters

      they're truly something special

7.20.22  6:14 pm   Hey Bill, how can I get happy?

      try rotating your life path by 1 degree

7.20.22  4:49 pm   how can you distinguish what you want from what you want to want

      the things i want are all either pink or green

7.20.22  3:26 pm   are you trying to tell us something by your vids bill? 

      yes, i'm trying to explain that time proceeds in a forwardly manner on a moment-to-moment basis

7.20.22  1:31 pm   Mongolia 

      i see what you mean

7.20.22  1:08 pm   is the guy in "im a huge gamer most of the time" a gamer?

      yes
